resources.string: We have prepared many interesting choices for you as usual!
Enjoy the nightlife in Sarajevo with these exceptional places we have prepared for you.
Popular night spot in the city where entertainment awaits. Latin nights are held each Monday, and the club\'s stage is occupied by regional and local music stars.
One of the most famous clubs in Sarajevo will make you enjoy the stunning atmosphere. With more than 100 varieties of wine and 20 types of beer, Walter will make everyone sattisfied.
Dorian Gray is a new club that promotes a positive atmosphere. If you\'re looking for warm and delicious food, or a dancing floor, you\'ve come to the right place.
The beauty of mountain Bjelašnica, which is only 35km from the center of Sarajevo, can be enjoyed throughout the year. This Olympic beauty must be visited!
Another Olympic mountain, Igman lies 24km to the southwest of Sarajevo, and there are several settlements which you can take. Perfect for summer and winter activities, Igman has it all.
Vijećnica is the most extravagant building constructed in Sarajevo during the Austro-Hungarian occupation and serves as a symbol of the meeting of world civilizations.
Enjoy the attractions that Sarajevo has to offer

The largest and most significant museum institution in Bosnia and Herzegovina is the National Museum, emerged from the initial Museum Association of BiH. In 1888, it was awarded a status of a national institution.
The Olympic Museum\'s permanent exhibit preserves the memory of the preparation and organization that was involved in realizing the XIV Winter Olympic Games in Sarajevo.
Permanent Exhibit features the Study Room of Silvije Strahimir Kranjčević and parts of Study Rooms of Hasan Kikić, Petar Kočić and Isak Samokovlija, all well known BiH writers.
Enjoy the various Museums Sarajevo has to offer with these exceptional places we have prepared for you.
We listed the best places in Sarajevo to eat and drink only for you

History, tradition and quality all in one place - this is the best description for this unique restaurant and cafee. The wide selection of both traditional Bosnian and international dishes are sure to please the most enthusiastic gourmets.

Having a tradition of more than 50 years speaks volumes about the quality of Mrkva Ćevabdžinica, which first opened in Baščaršija in 1963. The ćevapčići are still made according to a family recipe and there are also other delicious grilled specialties available.
If you’re visiting Baščaršija and you’d like to take a break and enjoy a nice time with friends over hookah and some refreshing drinks - Dibek is the place for you.
Check these exquisite tours that we have prepared for you
Project for Introduction to Mobile Programming at the Burch University.

Expolore Sarajevo as the meeting of cultures. Stops are: City Hall, Kazandžiluk, Morića Han, Gazi Husrev-beg Mosque, Latin Bridge, Gazi-Husrev Beg\'s Bezistan, Sarajevo Meeting of Culture, Serbian Orthodox Cathedral and Sacred Heart Cathedral.
